title: Cop Killer, $125K = BROKE? 8.23.21

description:
In episode 974, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Bitchuation Room's Francesca Fiorentini to discuss Mike Richards stepping down from the Jeopardy host position, the US targeting Black Lives Matter activists, cops continuing to due of Covid, Broke Bobby, Tesla's new robot, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. TDZ LIVE SHOW TICKETS!
  2. 'JEOPARDY!' MIKE RICHARDS STEPS DOWN AS HOST ... Aaron Rodgers Still Available???
  3. US targeted Black Lives Matter activists in bid to disrupt movement, report finds
  4. Hundreds of Cops Are Dying of COVID. They Still Won’t Get Vaccinated.
  5. Broke Bobby If You're Reading This Can You Please Ask Your Friends to Buy You Things
  6. TESLA TO BUILD ROBOT DESIGNED TO HAVE ITS ASS KICKED
  7. LISTEN: Jonti - Scrood (feat. Steve Lacy)
